title: How is St. Xavier's College Ranchi for the intermediate science stream? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think in Jharkhand st Xavier college is one of best option for you…… I was aslo part of that college… So i am suggesting you to go there there is very good education system…and better quality of teaching skill …so u will enjoy there ….for more information biat my channel at Youtube studnet pedia Hope this answer is useful for you
